title: Confusion for Android Wear
summary: If you like to laugh and make jokes you'll love this Android Wear application
description: This is the most fun to use your Android Wear smartwatch !Let your phone near your friends and triggers sounds remotely laughter guaranteed!You can choose from the sounds of farts, burps, animals, rings, alarms or sounds of your choice.Have fun: DTo use your sound, save your files in the "Ringtones" and please choose from the preferences.Please give feedback/suggestions on e-mail or on Google+ :https://plus.google.com/u/0/103120817703481624092/Note you need to have an Android Wear watch to be able to use this app.
descriptionHTML:
This is the most fun to use your Android Wear smartwatch !
Let your phone near your friends and triggers sounds remotely laughter guaranteed!
You can choose from the sounds of farts, burps, animals, rings, alarms or sounds of your choice.
Have fun: D

To use your sound, save your files in the "Ringtones" and please choose from the preferences.
Please give feedback/suggestions on e-mail or on Google+ :
https://plus.google.com/u/0/103120817703481624092/
Note you need to have an Android Wear watch to be able to use this app.
